Oil mergers, clean fuels vie for attention at Houston energy conferenceTop oil executives and ministers descend on Houston this week for one of the world's biggest energy conferences emboldened by blockbuster mergers, stable oil prices and less pressure for a large-scale move to clean fuels. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 13:41:15 GMT VLCITQHKKOBIJ5ONRC4D55IFY6M https://www.reuters.com/sustainability/climate-energy/ceraweek-oil-mergers-clean-fuels-vie-attention-houston-energy-conference-2024-03-17/Arathy Somasekhar可持续发展气候与能源
Catlin beats Puig in playoff to win International Series MacauAmerican John Catlin won the International Series Macau title on the second playoff hole on Sunday, staving off David Puig's spectacular late surge at the Macau Golf and Country Club. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 11:35:10 GMT 254FT23UUBIRVCRZWODG3JXU4A https://www.reuters.com/sports/golf/catlin-beats-puig-playoff-win-international-series-macau-2024-03-17/Reuters运动的高尔夫球
Xpeng to launch cheaper EV brand amid fierce China price competitionChinese electric-vehicle (EV) maker Xpeng announced plans to launch a cheaper brand, entering a highly competitive segment amid an intense price competition in the EV industry. Sun, 17 Mar 2024 05:36:14 GMT MIJY5FCZ55JCJJCT3Z35WDVCRQ https://www.reuters.com/business/autos-transportation/xpeng-launch-cheaper-ev-brand-amid-fierce-china-price-competition-2024-03-17/Reuters商业汽车与交通
Exclusive: Musk's SpaceX is building spy satellite network for US intelligence agency, sources sayThe $1.8 billion contract with the National Reconnaissance Office shows the extent of SpaceX's involvement in US intelligence and military projects and illustrates a deeper Pentagon investment into vast, low-Earth orbiting satellite systems aimed at supporting ground forces. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 15:19:53 GMT HBMUDRUWSBKXDEQNT66L2EDBQI https://www.reuters.com/technology/space/musks-spacex-is-building-spy-satellite-network-us-intelligence-agency-sources-2024-03-16/Joey Roulette, Marisa Taylor技术空间
Two injured in BBQ eatery blast in eastern ChinaTwo people were injured on Saturday after a powerful blast at a barbecue shop in the eastern Chinese city of Huaian, local authorities said, the latest incident to spur calls for better restaurant-safety checks across the country. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 13:52:38 GMT EBBUZ7QO5FLPBKJ6RYDRPREWIY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/two-injured-bbq-eatery-blast-eastern-china-2024-03-16/Reuters世界中国
Huawei says Chery's Luxeed S7 delays will be resolved in AprilHuawei said that a shortage of semiconductors and factory relocation issues that had delayed production and deliveries of its Luxeed S7 sedan should be resolved from next month, local media outlet Cailianshe reported on Saturday. Sat, 16 Mar 2024 11:53:52 GMT FVMODZ5QWZIG7D75ALH6CUWFX4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/huawei-says-cherys-luxeed-s7-delays-will-be-resolved-april-2024-03-16/Reuters技术
